title: Cherry-Chocolate Chunk Ice Cream
directions: Puree cherries in processor until almost smooth but some small pieces remain. Transfer to bowl. Add kirsch and let stand at room temperature 1 hour.
Place ice cream in large bowl. Stir in cherry mixture and chocolate. Cover and freeze until firm, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 4 ounces bittersweet (not unsweetened) or semisweet chocolate,coarsely chopped
